question: Which are the participants of the famous "Battle for Greatness" boxing match held in 2015?
option3: Floyd Mayweather Jr Vs. Manny Pacquiao
answer: Floyd Mayweather Jr Vs. Manny Pacquiao
explanation: Floyd Mayweather Jr. vs. Manny Pacquiao billed as the Fight of the Century or the Battle for Greatness was a professional boxing match between undefeated five-division world champion Floyd Mayweather Jr. and eight-division world champion Manny Pacquiao. It took place on May 2, 2015, at the MGM Grand Garden Arena in Las Vegas, Nevada. Mayweather Jr. won the contest by unanimous decision. Although the fight was considered to be one of the most anticipated sporting events in history, it was largely considered a letdown by critics and audiences alike upon its broadcast.
